suite.name: Amazon Tests

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

test.name: Caso de teste 01 - acesso ao menu "eletrônicos"

kw.name: Dado que acesso a home page do site amazon.com.br
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Quando verifico que o título da página é "Eletrônicos e Tecnologia"
kw.source_name: Quando verifico que o título da página é "${titulo}"

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: E vejo a frase "Eletrônicos e Tecnologia"
Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'Eletrônicos e Tecnologia'.
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Então vejo a categoria "Computadores e Informática"
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

test.doc: Verifica o menu eletrônicos das categorias do site Amazon.com.br

test.name: Caso de teste 02 - pesquisa de produtos

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Xbox Series S' into text field 'id=twotabsearchtextbox'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.
